title: Lolreplay Help
body: Hey guys, im just about to start a youtube up and all that crap but when i use lolreplay it comes up with an error when i go to play it after a match, and after i finally getting it working, theres another error, any idea how i can fix these?

replies.body:
yeah sorry, Lolreply can be an asshole.
Even I have tried updating it and it still refuses to work.

I am unsure of what Third party spectating programs that UberDanger and PeacePidgeon uses. So bad luck there.

I would recommend using FRAPS or OBS.
OBS is tricky to learn and can get complicated but is Free.

Fraps on the other hand (Its what I use. and aside from the black borders on the sides of my vids which hopefully I have fixed now) it records in High def, 1080 P or what ever.
It does however chunk up a shit ton of space.

1 league vid for me takes up about 60 gigs, so make sure you have space.

If you have Adobe After effects, (Once again its what I use)
You can create a new composition (Your video) Make sure the resolution is 16:9
Follow these very quick guides on how to set up a render and such so it looks like 1080 P 
and very good on YouTube.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q2iIVOGyTt4&list=PLZRrmLBrBbXFzVyMqsgy_Rtg3BvhwxpFW

Then render then Upload you should be all ok.

If you have any questions regarding recording, rendering etc I can do my best to help.
you can't, lol replay is just too outdated to work with league anymore. Try Baron replays
